sourcesContent:
<template>
    <section id="tinymce-editor">TinyMce Editor</section>
</template>
<script>
export default {
    mounted(){
        tinymce.init({
            selector:'#tinymce-editor',
            language:'zh_CN',
            //菜单栏
            // menubar:'bar1 bar2',
            // menu:{
            //     bar1:{title:'菜单栏1',items:'copy paste'},
            //     bar2:{titel:'菜单栏2',item:'cut preview'},
            // },
            //工具栏
            // toolbar:'undo redo preview',
            //插件  previes:预览插件
            // plugins:'preview'
        })
    },
}
</script>

<style lane="css" scoped>
 @import url('./skins/ui/oxide/skin.min.css');
</style>
